name: Discord
description: Voice, video, and text communication platform. Discord connects you with gaming communities and friends.
longDescription: Discord is the communication platform of choice for gamers and communities. It offers high-quality voice chat, video calls, screen sharing, and text channels all in one app. The Linux client provides the same features as other platforms, including push-to-talk, noise suppression, and integration with games. Whether you're coordinating with your team or hanging out with friends, Discord keeps you connected.

seo.title: Install Discord on Linux with OmniSet
seo.description: Install Discord on Linux with OmniSet. Voice chat, video calls, and community features. Stay connected with your gaming friends.
